name: EmojiDatingCoach
description:
Game Developed for GMTK Game Jam 2019. 
You are a dating coach, and is tasked with setting up an appropriate date for a client, with only emojis and a notebook at your disposal. 😂 😏

You may use each emoji only one time per conversation
coincidentally,   There is only one fish in the sea.  🐠❤️

The good ending isn't achieved by simply setting up a date, but managing go on awith the right one for your client. 😳 😅

Made by

Måns Mertner itch.io/marinlord

Johan Malmberg

Daniel Fors

Per Åkerström itch.io/molvin

Ingrid Sugrue 

Disclaimer: the game Is somewhat satirical, and should not be taken too seriously.
